item.description:
Good News Everyone!
I finally got off my ass and scheduled this event! I've been saying for a while now that I wanted to do a day at KRF, so lets do this.

The Faire is open from 10:30 to 6:00 every day. Don't worry if you can't make it for the 11 AM meeting at the Faire. We will be there a decent portion of the day and we should be able to round stragglers.

King Richard's Faire is located at 235 Main Street in Carver, MA about an hour outside of Boston. It has free parking on site. Tickets are $26, but there are $2 discounts available from the Metro newspaper (the one they give away on the T). If we get a group of 25+ (doubtful but possible) we can get tickets for $22. Children 5-11 are $15. Any children younger are free.

For a list of events and shows going on at the Faire, please refer to their website: http://kingrichardsfa...

If you would like to dress in costume for the event, feel free.

I hope to see you there!
-Josh

P.S. If we do get 25 people, I will set up an Amazon payment thing so we can get the group discount. If not, we can just get tickets at the gate.
item.how_to_find_us: You can call me at 774-766-2094. We will be meeting in the parking lot at 11AM for those morning people willing to do the trip so early.
item.name: King Richard's Faire
